article_title: Israeli strikes on Gaza mosque and school kill 26, health ministry says
sentence: Israeli  strikes  on  Gaza  mosque  and  school  kill  26,  health  ministry  says  T-I-T-L-E-E-N-D.

article_title: Israeli strikes on Gaza mosque and school kill 26, health ministry says
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  says  26  people  have  been  killed  in  Israeli  air  strikes  on  a  mosque  and  school  housing  displaced  Palestinians  in  the  centre  of  the  territory.

article_title: Israeli strikes on Gaza mosque and school kill 26, health ministry says
sentence: Earlier,  the  Hamas-run  civil  defence  agency  said  21  people  were  killed  and  a  large  number  wounded  in  the  strike  on  the  mosque,  according  to  the  AFP  news  agency.

article_title: Israeli strikes on Gaza mosque and school kill 26, health ministry says
sentence: Sunday's  strikes  occurred  almost  exactly  one  year  on  from  7  October  2023,  when  Hamas  gunmen  attacked  Israel,  killing  around  1,200  people  and  taking  251  hostage.

article_title: Israeli strikes on Gaza mosque and school kill 26, health ministry says
sentence: Since  then,  41,870  Palestinians  have  been  killed  and  more  than  97,000  injured  in  Gaza,  according  to  the  health  ministry.

article_title: Israeli strikes on Gaza mosque and school kill 26, health ministry says
sentence: According  to  the  United  Nations,  which  uses  Gaza  health  ministry  figures  and  considers  them  reliable,  187  people  were  killed  in  Gaza  from  30  September  to  4  October  alone.
